content: wavy textured stripes of color adorn this cute crochet skirt for the perfect way to refresh your spring wardrobe featuring 4 vibrant shades of silky caron simply soft the pattern is worked in 2 pieces with side seams a combination of crochet chains and other stitches creates the unique wave-textured stripes that bring the colors to life pair it with a simple tank or tee for an effortlessly chic casual look that s sure to turn heads materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 1 g 315 yds/288 m sizes xs/s m l contrast a sage 39705 1 1 1 ball contrast b plum wine 39722 1 1 1 ball contrast c lt country blue 39709 1 1 1 ball contrast d dk country blue 39711 1 1 1 ball sizes xl 2xl contrast a sage 39705 1 2 ball s contrast b plum wine 39722 1 2 ball s contrast c lt country blue 39709 1 2 ball s contrast d dk country blue 39711 2 2 balls sizes to fit hip measurement xs/s 34-36 86 5-91 5 cm m 38-40 96 5-101 5 cm l 42-44 106 5-112 cm xl 46-48 117-122 cm 2/3xl 50-52 127-132 cm
